item.title: Mars Rover Robotics: End Effector Design
item.author: g.kailash@wustl.edu (Kailash Gupta-Verma)
item.description: Designing a durable, high-torque claw for the WashU Mars Rover Team’s 2024–25 University Rover Challenge entry

item.title: MeshAlyzer: Dynamic Hernia Mesh Testing Platform
item.author: g.kailash@wustl.edu (Kailash Gupta-Verma)
item.description: A biomedical testing device designed to simulate realistic intra-abdominal pressures for evaluating surgical hernia meshes.

item.title: Fulfil Solutions: Tote Clip Compliance
item.author: g.kailash@wustl.edu (Kailash Gupta-Verma)
item.description: Improving bag retention reliability in automated grocery systems through compliant spring design and tolerance optimization.

item.title: Circuit Car: Bluetooth-Controlled Autonomous Vehicle
item.author: g.kailash@wustl.edu (Kailash Gupta-Verma)
item.description: Designing and refining a microcontroller-based vehicle with Bluetooth control, ultrasonic sensing, and custom motor circuitry.
